text: Ye not too bad. Always learning, which is good. I'm keen to get into a studio though! Get a salary, I need to get applying for the summer internships again.

Also I need a we bit of help with something if you don't mind. I posted on the houdini Facebook but I've not had any response yet. I use * in hscript sometimes to refer to 'anything' eg deleting all attributes. What would be the equivalent in vex? I want to create a new group or attribute with all primitives which are part of a group with 'wood' or 'steel' somewhere in the name of the original group. Hope that makes sense. Thanks for your help!
